queries.name: root
queries.query: INSERT INTO ECCPI_AF_WELL_FOUND_TAGS(AREA_PI_TAG_NAME,PI_TAG_DESCRIPTOR,SRC_PI_SERVER_CD,AREA_POINT_ID) SELECT '{0}','{1}','{2}',{3} from DUAL where NOT EXISTS(select AREA_POINT_ID from ECCPI_AF_WELL_FOUND_TAGS where AREA_POINT_ID = {3} and AREA_PI_TAG_NAME = '{0}')
UPDATE ECCPI_SERVERS_LIST set PI_LAST_TAG_PULL_DT = CURRENT_DATE where PI_SERVER_CD LIKE '{0}'
